snippet.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 | OnAir Airline Manager | Introducing: The Freelance Dashboard
snippet.description:
Discover the brand-new Freelance Dashboard in OnAir Airline Manager, launching in early December 2024! 
This innovative feature is designed to simplify flying for new players, letting you focus on flying without managing a company. Perfect for beginners or anyone looking to explore freelance missions, the dashboard brings together all job options—Charters, Regular Routes, and Virtual Airlines—in one easy-to-use interface.

Switch to Advanced Management anytime to unlock full airline control and take your experience to the next level. Watch the video to see how the Freelance Dashboard makes flying simpler and more fun!
  
✈️ Features:
- Fly missions without managing an airline
- Ideal for new players and freelance pilots
- Easily transition to Advanced Management when ready


🔔 Subscribe for updates and stay tuned for more features in OnAir!


Start your OnAir Airline Manager Free Trial here:
https://www.onair.company/onair-airline-manager/

What is OnAir Airline Manager?
Manage your Pilot Career or your own Airline Company in an online, persistent world. Start small by renting an aircraft to complete missions and grow your airline to greatness. Fly missions yourself if you’re a flight simmer, or hire virtual pilots to handle them for you. But beware—real-time weather affects your jobs, so plan carefully!

Compatible with Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020, X-Plane 11, XPlane12, P3D, and FSX:SE.

More Information:
🌐 Learn more about OnAir Airline Manager:
https://www.onair.company/

💬 Join us on Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/WY5htXu

#MicrosoftFlightSimulator #MSFS2020 #Careeradd-on #XPlane #P3D #FSX #msfs2024
